name: Giri Narasimhan
content: Prof. Giri Narasimhan Giri Narasimhan Distinguished University Professor, FIU; Ryder Endowed Professor & 2023 Top Scholar Google Cloud Research Innovator, 2024; (Blog) Director, UKG Academy for CS Education Coach, FIU Programming Team Coordinator, MS in Data Science and AI Knight Foundation School of Computing & Information Sciences Florida International University 11200 SW 8th Street, CASE 254B, Miami, FL 33199-0001. Ph: (305) 348-3748; Lab: (305) 348-6250 Fax: (305) 348-3549; Email: girics.fiu.edu ; girifiu.edu Research All Publications; Software Research Group (BioRG); BioRG Publications Algorithms for Machine Learning and Data Analytics (AMaDAys) Google Scholar Scopus Author Teaching CAP 5768: Intro to Data Science F18, F19, F20, F21 COP 4534: Algorithmic Techniques F21 CAP 2752: Foundations of Data Science COT 6405: Analysis of Algorithms F19 COT 5407: Intro to Algorithms S19, S17, F08 IDC 6940: Capstone in Data Science Su20, S20, F19, F18 CAP 5510/CGS 5166: Bioinformatics F18, S15, S13, S11, S08, S07, S06, S05, F03 COP 3530 Data Structures F16, S04 COT 6936: Topics in Algorithms S14, S12 BSC 4934: Q'BIC Capstone Su11, Su10 COP 4516: Competitive Programming & Problem Solving Miscellaneous Links: E-mail (SCS); E-mail (FIU) Hurricanes (I, II, and NR); Dictionary Corona Virus Meters (I and II) Emergency 348-HELP(4357) FIU Programming Team; Join Team Discord Server: Linktree; Old Lectures Video Recordings on Problem Solving: I, II Join vJudge for online judge environment. In Memoriam Melita Jaric, Ph.D. student, passed away on March 11, 2013. A bright, promising life was snuffed out in a careless hit-and-run accident. For more details, click here Memorial Service Video: click here Melita Jaric Memorial Travel Award: To donate click here Travel Fellowships: Our efforts I am convinced that everything that is worth while in the world has been accomplished by the free, inquiring, critical spirit... But the men of ritual and the men of barbarism are capable of shutting up the men of science and of silencing them forever." â€” Sinclair Lewis, from It Can't Happen Here A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on a cold iron... Horace Mann A teacher is a facilitator of learning, a curator of content, and most of all, a motivator of learning... D. B. Phatak Teacher vs Guru Edited Volume Bionformatics Research and Applications Zhipeng Cai, Ion Mandoiu, Giri Narasimhan, Pavel Skums, and Xuan Guo LNCS/LNBI Vol. 12304, Springer Verlag, 2020. [ISBN: 0521815134] Also available in eBook format. Slides by M. Farshi from course based on book: Spring 2014. Edited volume Advances In Bioinformatics And Its Applications Eds: M. He, Giri Narasimhan, S. Petoukhov Series in Mathematical Biology and Medicine Vol. 8, 632 Pages, May 2005 World Scientific Press. [ISBN: 981-256-148-X] Editor: International Journal of Bioinformatics Research and Applications. Tutorials on Transformers: Annotated Transformer (Alexander Rush, 2018); Annotated Transformer (Updated by Huang et al., 2022); Illustrated Transformer (by Jay Alammar); The Data8 text book project on Data Science, by Adhikari and DeNero. Computational and Inferential Thinking textbook, by Adhikari, DeNero, and Wagner Text: Data Science -- A First Introduction, by Timbers, Campbell, Lee. Geographical Data Science with Python, by Rey, Arribas-Bel, Wolf. An Introduction to Earth and Environmental Data Science, by Ryan Abernathy et al. (Python-based) Introduction to Programming in Python (4 chapters), by Sedgewick, Wayne, and Dondero. Shiny with Python: create interactive visualizations and web apps in Python. Also see examples; Intro to CS - Python Learn Python(Self-paced) Python Data Science Handbook, Jake VandePlas Applied Statistics with R text by David Dalpiaz Datasets from CalTech Vision Lab (Useful for ML/AI Projects) Webseer to compare Google search results AI For Science, 2019. MGED: Gene Expression Data Standardization Initiative. Graphics Gallery: from the National Health Museum (great short lessons in Mol. Biol). Great Experiments Series: Read about some of the greatest experiments that led to great discoveries! Also Material for MkDocs to create themes.
